targets.query:
from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        (r._field == "online")
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        (r._field == "idle")
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" 
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["_value"])
    |> rename(columns: {wifiBand: "_value"})
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        (r._field == "link_bandwidth")
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        (r._field == "tx_failures")
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        (r._field == "rx_decrypt_failures")
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        r._field == "rx_total_bytes"
        )
    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        r._field == "tx_total_bytes"
        )
    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        r._field == "tx_total_bytes"
        )
        |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        (r._field == "rssi")
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        r._field == "rx_total_bytes"
        )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        (r._field == "rssi_antenna1" or r._field == "rssi_antenna2" or r._field == "rssi_antenna3" or r._field == "rssi_antenna4") and
        r._value < 0
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        (r._field == "noise_antenna1" or r._field == "noise_antenna2" or r._field == "noise_antenna3" or r._field == "noise_antenna4") and
        r._value < 0
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        (r._field == "rssi_antenna1_avg" or r._field == "rssi_antenna2_avg" or r._field == "rssi_antenna3_avg" or r._field == "rssi_antenna4_avg") and
        r._value < 0
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: 游니 Received Signal Strength Indicator (RSSI) - Average

targets.query:
from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        r._field == "rx_rate_pkt"
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        r._field == "tx1_rate_pkt"
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "test")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus_wificlients" and
        r.hostname == "${hostname}" and 
        r.ip == "${ip}" and
        r._field == "tx2_rate_pkt"
        )
//    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "ip", "wifi", "wifiBand"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "test",
    tag: "hostname",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "test",
    tag: "hostname",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "test")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "router_asus_wificlients")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> distinct(column: "ip")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> yield(name: "last")
list.label: IP
list.name: ip
list.query:
from(bucket: "test")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "router_asus_wificlients")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> distinct(column: "ip")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> yield(name: "last")
